the Galway Statement on Atlantic Ocean Cooperation<sup>1</sup> and defines Ocean Literacy<sup>2</sup> objectives in the context of that cooperation and societal challenges The statement is drafted by participants of the Transatlantic Ocean Literacy Workshop, 5th-6th September 2013, Plymouth, UK.</p>  <p><sup>1 </sup>Galway Statement on Transatlantic Cooperation,
